example.code:
PS C:\> New-EC2SecurityGroup -GroupName my-security-group -Description "my security group" -VpcId vpc-12345678
sg-12345678
example.description: This example creates a security group for the specified VPC.

example.code:
PS C:\> New-EC2SecurityGroup -GroupName my-security-group -Description "my security group"
sg-45678901
example.description: This example creates a security group for EC2-Classic.
